articles.title: From Steam to Reddit: How Much Personal Data Hardcore PC Users Leak Without Realizing It
articles.description: Hardcore PC users tend to think of privacy risk as something that happens to other people: the careless, the click-happy, the ones who reuse passwords or fall for obvious scams. Power users, by contrast, optimize. They tweak BIOS settings, benchmark GPUs, curate mod lists, and participate deeply in ...

articles.title: 3199 Jackson Street in Photos
articles.description: This 1920s apartment complex utilized as a modern family compound in the affluent Pacific Heights neighborhood is now available for $32 million.

articles.title: This voice email tool brings audio to Gmail and Outlook for $39.99
articles.description: Chorde voice email for Gmail and Outlook is offering its lifetime Pro Plan for $39.99, an 80 percent discount on a tool that lets users send voice messages directly from their inbox.
articles.content:
TL;DR: Chorde, a voice email tool that works inside Gmail and Outlook, is offering its lifetime Pro Plan for $39.99, an 80% discount.

articles.title: Samsung confirms new pricing, release date and availability for Galaxy Book6 and Galaxy Book6 Ultra laptops
articles.description: Samsung has confirmed updated pricing and availability for its new Galaxy Book6, Galaxy Book6 Pro and Galaxy Book6 Ultra laptops. Not only that, but the company has also specified the European countries in which the three Intel Panther Lake-based laptops will be initially available, too.
articles.content: Samsung has confirmed pricing information for the Galaxy Book6 series in more markets. To recap, we revealed Eurozone pricing for dozens of Galaxy Book6, Galaxy Book6 Pro and Galaxy Book6 Ultra SKUs at the start of the month during a hands-on with al... [608 chars]

articles.title: JBL launches BandBox Solo and BandBox Trio for musicians to practice, create and perform
articles.description: JBL has launched the BandBox – an AI-powered amp and portable speaker built for musicians from beginners to experts. The new JBL BandBox Solo and BandBox Trio offer real time vocal and instrument separation along with JBL’s signature sound and built-in effects and practice tools.
